list_definition.definition: the cloudlike gases and particles of soot given off by something which is burning

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Smoke was coming out of the chimney
He puffed cigarette smoke into my face.

list_definition.definition: an act of smoking (a cigarette etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I came outside for a smoke.

list_definition.definition: to draw in and puff out the smoke from (a cigarette etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I don’t smoke, but he smokes cigars.

list_definition.definition: to dry, cure, preserve (ham, fish etc) by hanging it in smoke.
